mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT MEMO_NO FROM MEMO WHERE ID=#{id} AND MEMO_DELETE='N' ORDER BY MEMO_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1
SELECT MEMO_NO, TO_CHAR(MEMO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')"MEMO_DATE", MAIN_NO, MEMO_TYPE FROM MEMO WHERE ID=#{id} AND MEMO_DELETE='N' ORDER BY MEMO.MEMO_NO ASC

SELECT MEMO.MEMO_NO, TO_CHAR(MEMO_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MEMO_DATE", MEMO_CON, MAIN_NO, MEMO_TYPE
FROM MEMO
, MP_TITLE, TO_CHAR(MP_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MP_START" , TO_CHAR(MP_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "MP_END", MP_TIME, MP_MAIN, MP_SUB, MP_MEMO FROM MEMO JOIN MONTHLY_PLAN MP ON(MEMO.MEMO_NO=MP.MEMO_NO)
, TO_CHAR(AB_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "AB_DATE", APC_TITLE, AEC_TITLE, AB_AMOUNT, AB_MEMO FROM MEMO JOIN ACCOUNT_BOOK AB ON(MEMO.MEMO_NO=AB.MEMO_NO) LEFT JOIN A_PROFIT_CATEGORY AP ON(AB.APC_NO=AP.APC_NO) LEFT JOIN A_EXPENDITURE_CATEGORY AE ON(AB.AEC_NO=AE.AEC_NO)
, BL_TITLE, MB_TITLE, MB_PHONE, MB_TIME, MB_MEMO, MB_ADDRESS, MEMO_TYPE FROM MEMO JOIN MAP_BOOKMARK MB ON(MEMO.MEMO_NO=MB.MEMO_NO) JOIN BOOKMARK_LIST BL ON(MB.BL_NO=BL.BL_NO)
, BL_TITLE, UB_TITLE, UB_CON, UB_URL, MEMO_TYPE FROM MEMO JOIN URL_BOOKMARK UB ON(MEMO.MEMO_NO=UB.MEMO_NO) JOIN BOOKMARK_LIST BL ON(UB.BL_NO=BL.BL_NO)
WHERE MEMO.MEMO_NO=#{memoNo}
SELECT BL_NO, BL_TITLE, BL_TYPE FROM BOOKMARK_LIST WHERE ID=#{id} AND BL_DELETE='N'
